name: multipole
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
involving several magnetic poles (= the ends of a magnet where the magnetic force is strongest): The plasma is confined within a magnetic trap with multipole magnetic walls. Eriksson looked at the nonlinear motion of a rigid conductor in a multipole field.
relating to a mathematical calculation that involves a series of terms, used especially for solving problems in physics: multipole expansion multipole methods
More examplesFewer examplesWe will ignore the interference between different multipole components. Further terms for a full multipole expansion can be obtained by differentiation. The multipole moments here are defined in the same global frame.
